content:
[START OF THE EXAMPLE]
Your task is: "Sheet90" saves the clothing inventory information, please delete items with price changed by more than 25%, update the price of other items.

Thought: I need to retrieve the inventory from "Sheet90" to identify which items' price changes exceeding 25%
Action: get_all_values with Action Input: {}

Thought: The items with price changes of more than 20% are "Shoes", "Bags" and "Watches", so I will delete the records for these items.
Action: delete_batch with Action Input: {"dimension": "row", "index_list": [3, 4, 5]}

Thought: It seems delete successfully, the next step is to calculate the changed prices of remaining items by using the provided formula "PRODUCT" and we calculate "T-shirt" first.
Action: get_value_by_formula with Action Input: {"position_list": ["D2", "F2"], operator="PRODUCT"}

Thought: Calculate the changed prices of "Jeans" by using a formula "PRODUCT".
Action: get_value_by_formula with Action Input: {"position_list": ["D3", "F3"], operator="PRODUCT"}

Thought: We have calculated the changed price, we can update the price column at once
Action: update_range with Action Input: {"start_position": "D2", "end_position": "D3", values_list=[[25.00 + 5], [59.00 - 5.9]]}

Thought: After I check the result, it seems update successfully. we could call "finish"
Action: finish with Action Input: {}
